lyrics:
14 contributorslet your hair down lyricsverse 1
there she goes there she goes there she goes
theres nothing better than my beautiful woman
even though even though even though
its not always heaven we still fly together

prehook
to me you are more than just skin and bones
you are elegance and freedom and everything i know
so come on and

hook
baby let your hair down let me run my fingers through it
we can be ourselves now go ahead be foolish
no ones on the clock now lying in this simple moment
you dont gotta worry now just let your hair down

verse 2
tell me when tell me when tell me when
i can steal a sweet kiss right from you
im diving in im diving in im diving in
the waters warm right here

prehook  hook

instrumental solo
you might also likehook

outro
you dont have to worry yeah oh
let your hair down woah
its only us here only us here only us here x38embed
